title: provisionals
body: What are provisionals how do they work and when are they?

replies.body: i spent a while getting to silver in the pre season however im wondering at the start of next season will it matter if i worked to get to silver? As in will i just be put in iron or will i work my way up from silver

>What are provisionals

Provisionals are the 10 games you play to receive your rank.

>how do they work

When you are unranked and play one game of ranked, this is your first provisional. After completing your first provis game you will receive a provisional rank (visible only to you), this is the minimum rank you can achieve once you are formally placed.

If you have been placed before, this rank (and the rank you are formally placed at) will almost always be *lower* than your previous seasons rank.

For the next 9 games, you LP gains will be faster, you won't have to complete promotional series to advance in rank, and you cannot lose LP. You will not be placed below the minimum rank you start with.

Once you have completed those 10 provis games you will be formally placed, LP gains, losses, and promotions will return to normal, and your rank will be visible to other players.

>when are they?

You will play provisional games whenever your account is unranked, so whenever you play on an account that has never been placed, or when you play ranked in a new season after the reset.
